start.text: hehehe, Welcome to my bean kingdom
I've spent years procuring as many beans as possible until I had a bean army
I've bean bored recently though, let's have some fun together
Wouldn't it be funny if you ate all of the beans that I've collected?
Maybe if you can type well enough, you can make it out of this alive

castle.text: hehehehe, seems like you might have a chance
It looks like you've managed to make it through my kingdom
Let's see if you can breach my bean castle!
Wouldn't it be funny if there were more beans attacking at once?
I'll check in later, au revoir!

chamber.text: hahaha, this is really getting interesting now!
You've made it through my bean castle, welcome to my chamber!
you'll be facing off against my strongest bean, this is gonna be good.

ending_bad.text: Wow, this is pathetic. I really expected more from you.
I guess the beans were a better investment after all.
I really thought this would be more amusing.
Maybe I can still have a laugh from you getting eaten by the beans, though

ending_good.text: This is the best thing I've seen in a long time. Thanks for the thoroughly amusing show!
I guess you're free to go now. Thanks for beaning such a good bean about the whole thing
